attributes.action: Release a book or leaflet every year, outlining EXACTLY where every percent of the huge 40% chunk of our earnings is actually going
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would make me feel a lot more willing to pay this huge chunk of my earnings as i would be able to physically see what my money is doing, and maybe let me know why me and such a huge amount of people i know are in such deep debts from loosing nearly half their pay cheques.
